post:
VPSDime is a new trade name for our company that's been around for the last 2 years with different trade names such as Cloudive and Backupsy.

We have noticed that we have not had the honors to have you as customers and therefore I wanted to offer an exclusive deal just for you.

Our plans have been hosted in Corexchange facility with Incero's AWESOME route optimized performance network with a rocking 100% uptime record in Dallas, TX.

Plan Details:

  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • SolusVM Extended WHMCS Module
  • 2 vCPU
  • 4GB Memory
  • 30GB HDD
  • 2TB Traffic Limit
  • 4 x 1Gbps Uplink (Load Balanced)
  • 1 IP Address
  • $59.95/Year
Purchase Now: https://vpsdime.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=8

 

Reviews: http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/15409/vpsdime-1-month-review/p1

 

Node Specs:

  • Dual Intel Xeon E5 2620 CPU
  • 384GB DDR3 ECC
  • 8 x 10K Drives RAID10
  • 4 x 1Gbps LACP
Speed Test:

  • 192.211.62.100
  • http://192.211.62.100/100MB.test
